Some REACH basic `tmap` options

Source: R/viz.R
tmap_options_reach.Rd

Give some reach colors and font for maps

Usage

tmap_options_reach(
  check_and_fix = T,
  fontfamily = "Leelawadee UI",
  fontface = 1,
  legend_title_size = 0.9,
  legend_text_size = 0.8,
  legend_text_fontface = 1,
  legend_width = 0.9,
  legend_position = c("right", 0.14),
  legend_frame = impactR::reach_colors()$reach_dk_grey,
  output_dpi = 500,
  frame = impactR::reach_cols("main_grey"),
  inner_margins = c(0, 0, 0, 0),
  outer_margins = c(0, 0, 0, 0),
  asp = 0,
  ...
)

Arguments

check_and_fix

Param check.and.fix from `tmap::tmap_options()`

fontfamily

Param fontfamily from `tmap::tmap_options()`

fontface

Param fontface from `tmap::tmap_options()`

legend_title_size

Param legend.title.size from `tmap::tmap_options()`

legend_text_size

Param legend.text.size from `tmap::tmap_options()`

legend_text_fontface

Param legend legend.text.fontface from `tmap::tmap_options()`

legend_width

Param legend.width from `tmap::tmap_options()`

legend_position

Param legend.position from `tmap::tmap_options()`

legend_frame

Param legend.frame from `tmap::tmap_options()`

output_dpi

Param output.dpi from `tmap::tmap_options()`

frame

Frame colors using `impactR::reach_cols()`

inner_margins

Param inner.margins from `tmap::tmap_options()`

outer_margins

Param outer.margins from `tmap::tmap_options()`

asp

Param asp from `tmap::tmap_options()`

...

Other parameters to pass to `tmap::tmap_options()`

Value

Load tmap options globally
